errors.name: RagePluginHook Failed to Initialize
errors.description: RagePluginHook cannot start or fails during initialization
solutions: Ensure GTA V is running as administrator
Update RagePluginHook to the latest version
Verify GTA V is updated to the latest version
Check for conflicting ASI loaders
Reinstall RagePluginHook

errors.name: ScriptHookV Not Found
errors.description: ScriptHookV is missing or not properly installed
solutions: Download latest ScriptHookV from dev-c.com
Extract dinput8.dll and ScriptHookV.dll to GTA V root folder
Ensure you're using the correct version for your GTA V version
Verify GTA V is not updated beyond ScriptHookV support

errors.name: LSPDFR Plugin Load Failure
errors.description: LSPDFR fails to load or crashes on startup
solutions: Ensure RagePluginHook is up to date
Check for plugin conflicts in the plugins folder
Verify all dependencies are installed (ELS, LSPDFR+, etc.)
Clear the RPH cache folder
Reinstall LSPDFR

errors.name: Out of Memory Error
errors.description: Game crashes due to insufficient memory
solutions: Reduce number of active plugins
Lower in-game graphics settings
Use Heap Adjuster mod
Install Packfile Limit Adjuster
Close background applications

errors.name: Version Mismatch
errors.description: Plugin version incompatible with game or dependencies
solutions: Update all plugins to latest versions
Check plugin compatibility with current GTA V version
Downgrade GTA V if using outdated plugins
Check LSPDFR forums for compatibility information

errors.name: ELS Configuration Error
errors.description: Emergency Lighting System fails to load or configure properly
solutions: Verify ELS.dll is in the plugins folder
Check ELS.ini for syntax errors
Ensure vehicle ELS files are properly formatted
Update ELS to latest version
Check for conflicting lighting mods

errors.name: Random Game Crash
errors.description: Game crashes without specific error message
solutions: Check crash logs for specific errors
Disable plugins one by one to identify culprit
Verify game files through Steam/Rockstar Launcher
Update graphics drivers
Run game as administrator

errors.name: ASI Loader Issues
errors.description: ASI Loader not working or conflicts present
solutions: Ensure only ONE dinput8.dll is present in GTA V folder
Use the ASI Loader from ScriptHookV package
Check asiloader.log for specific errors
Verify ASI files are in the correct location

errors.name: Missing Dependencies
errors.description: Required files or dependencies are missing
solutions: Install Visual C++ Redistributables (2013, 2015-2019)
Install .NET Framework 4.8
Verify all mod dependencies are installed
Check mod installation instructions

errors.name: Plugin Conflict
solutions: Disable half your plugins to identify conflicting ones
Check plugin compatibility lists
Update all plugins to latest versions
Remove duplicate or similar functionality plugins
